snippet: The business software maker Oracle posted flat quarterly revenue and slightly lower profit as the dollar strengthened.
abstract: Oracle reports quarterly net profit of $2.49 billion, down from $2.56 billion in period one year earlier; shares rise 3.3 percent on news, as company announces that it has raised dividend 25 percent to 15 cents per share.
lead_paragraph: The business software maker Oracle posted flat quarterly revenue and slightly lower profit as the dollar strengthened.

headline.main: Oracle Has a Flat Quarter, but It Raises Its Dividend
headline.print_headline: Oracle Has a Flat Quarter, but It Raises Its Dividend
